content: First, I’m very irritated by this on your behalf. Second, since you mentioned it’s cheap, do you have a friend in San Francisco who could receive a “backup” device in case you run into trouble with the airline again? Third, are you going to fly United, or perhaps another airline next time? You can fire the entire company by taking your business elsewhere. Enough people do this… And I sincerely wish you all the best in your marriage and travels.
